title: Blocked URLs
description: Configure URLs to block from forwarding. Matching requests will be intercepted and return an error.

section.title: URL Blocklist
section.description: Add URLs to block. Supports path prefix matching and full URL matching.

form.listHint: Start with / for path matching, or http:// or https:// for full URL matching

rules.title: Matching Rules:
rules.pathMatch: Path matching: Start with / (e.g., /v1/complete) to check request path
rules.fullMatch: Full URL matching: Start with http:// or https:// to check upstream full URL

errors.invalidFormat: Invalid URL format, must start with /, http://, or https://
